{
  "query":"SELECT page, COUNT(*) AS counts /
    FROM wikipedia WHERE \"__time\" /
    BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2015-09-12 00:00:00' AND TIMESTAMP '2015-09-13 00:00:00' /
    GROUP BY page ORDER BY Edits DESC LIMIT 10"
}
